## Temperatura
```{r echo = FALSE}
dygraph(tables$temp[, c("time", "_value")], group = "senpork") |> dySeries("_value", label ="Temperatura (C)") |> dyRangeSelector()
```
## Humedad
```{r echo = FALSE}

```
